channel.title: Help with mopar
channel.description:
Hey everyone, i got a problem with my new moparscape, i just downloaded it.. and i need some help.
first of all, i wanna put my server on the status page...
how can i change my name of moparscape? everytime i try to change server it doesnt work :( please help on that...
second i need help on is.. What folder will let me code the moparscape to a better version? Please help :)
third is.. would it let me to change the ip to something els instead of.. 127.0.0.1? Please help.

item.title: Help with mopar
item.dc:creator: @Codster.se Codster.se
item.description:
@Codster.se wrote:

I got a zip, how can i put it online, can someone give me a link were i can re-download one that will let me code, and put online for others to play?

Read full topic

item.title: Help with mopar
item.dc:creator: @adrian1372 adrian1372
item.description:
@adrian1372 wrote:

[quote=“Codster.se, post:1, topic:370464”]Hey everyone, i got a problem with my new moparscape, i just downloaded it… and i need some help.

first of all, i wanna put my server on the status page…

how can i change my name of moparscape?
everytime i try to change server it doesnt work please help on that…

second i need help on is… What folder will let me code the moparscape to a better version?
Please help

third is… would it let me to change the ip to something els instead of… 127.0.0.1?
Please help.[/quote]

Is it delta, PI, czar,… what is it? If you just downloaded the moparscape client and host by clicking start server, then you can’t put it online on other things than localhost unless u add some loadz of code

Read full topic
